entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS, MAINLY THIS MORNING
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING SOUTH THIS AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS LIKELY
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHEAST IN THE AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHWEST AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE MORNING
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S

HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
